CustomField.description: Indicates if Product Cost is included in the Labor and Charged to the Customer (pre 6/1/19 and in process invoices that have SO Invoices with 100% Markdown)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if Product Cost is included in the Labor and Charged to the Customer (pre 6/1/19 and in process invoices that have SO Invoices with 100% Markdown)
CustomField.label: Product Included?
